solution_line_template: Heaven's brother used {erasers_bought}*{eraser_price} = $<<{erasers_bought}*{eraser_price}={brother_erasers_cost}>>{brother_erasers_cost} to buy erasers.

The total amount of money Heaven and her sister spent on sharpeners, notebooks, and erasers is {brother_erasers_cost}+{heaven_notebooks_cost}+{heaven_sharpeners_cost} = $<<{brother_erasers_cost}+{heaven_notebooks_cost}+{heaven_sharpeners_cost}={total_spent_on_known_items}>>{total_spent_on_known_items}

The total amount of money her brother spent on highlighters is {total_money_given}-{total_spent_on_known_items} =$<<{total_money_given}-{total_spent_on_known_items}={brother_highlighters_cost}>>{brother_highlighters_cost}
